column1: Adam gave his friend an apple instead of an orange because his friend was quite fond of the _ . (A) orange (B) apple
William wants to file a lawsuit so he asks Aaron for help, because _ is a lawyer. (A) William (B) Aaron
Brian suffers a lot from loneliness compared to Brett because _ has lost all of his family. (A) Brian (B) Brett
Cynthia recommended a high protein diet to Elena , even though _ was more knowledgeable about nutrition than she was. (A) Cynthia (B) Elena
I wanted to download new files onto my computer but there was not enough space. The _ was too limited. (A) file (B) space
He bought her a plain band but she wanted a ring with a gemstone - the _ was much pricier. (A) band (B) gemstone
It took me longer to do the drawing of the house than the drawing of the tree because the _ was basic. (A) tree (B) house
Sarah had a difficult childhood but Kayla had a spoiled one. _ never received gifts on their birthday. (A) Sarah (B) Kayla
Although he was 50, James wanted to go skiing with his boyfriend but he wasn't very fit. They chose surfing instead because the _ was easier. (A) surfing (B) skiing
Amy decorated the eggs with glitter and it got on the book as well. The _ looked messy afterward. (A) book (B) eggs
Laura hates to cook more than Carrie because cooking is _ favorite hobby right now. (A) Laura (B) Carrie
Even though the state is smaller than the country, it is better because the _ has lots of debt.. (A) state (B) country
The throw cleared the fence but crashed into the wall, as the _ was so much higher. (A) fence (B) wall
She didn't want to calculate the cost of the car instead of the scooter, since the _ was expensive. (A) car (B) scooter
Victoria told Erin that she had never done any type of  skiing before.  _ was afraid. (A) Victoria (B) Erin
We added strawberry flavor to the milk but not the cream, since the _ tasted worse with it. (A) milk (B) cream
Neal didn't apply for a trombone scholarship, but he did apply for a piano scholarship because he'd always been great at the _ . (A) trombone (B) piano
William wants to file a lawsuit so he asks Aaron for help, because _ knows nothing about law. (A) William (B) Aaron
The college campus was told to close because the weather was threatening to be very bad. The _ was predictable and followed the rules. (A) weather (B) college
Samantha is considered to be the better dog breeder than Patricia, so _ must do crappier on the AKC inspection. (A) Samantha (B) Patricia
Christopher admired the beard that Nick had grown, so _ asked how he did it. (A) Christopher (B) Nick
When it was time to go, we took the train instead of the taxi because the _ would take longer to get home. (A) taxi (B) train
Ursula only bought the parchment paper on sale instead of the plain paper, because the _ was usually more expensive. (A) parchment paper (B) plain paper
Emily avoided getting the hypothermia that Maria succumbed to, because _ had worn appropriate clothing. (A) Emily (B) Maria
I bought a new picture but it wouldn't fit in the frame, because the _ was too weak. (A) picture (B) frame
the statistics show many females compared to the males are being born everyday, the _ are few. (A) females (B) males
Rebecca wondered how Maria kept so trim , so _ offered her diet and exercise advice. (A) Rebecca (B) Maria
Lawrence gets a better workout at the gym than Craig because _ paid for a personal trainer. (A) Lawrence (B) Craig
The cucumber tasted much better than the tomato did because the _ was much greener. (A) cucumber (B) tomato
Logan got pink eye but Eric was clear, because _ avoided people who had been exposed. (A) Logan (B) Eric
The scratches were deep on the table but did not harm the door, as the _ was vulnerable to damage. (A) table (B) door
The chocolate could not be sliced with the knife because the _ it too blunt. (A) chocolate (B) knife
